name: Freixenet
ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Spawn a Young Dryad on this row.
Cooldown: 4
Devotion: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cooldown by the duration of Vitality on self.
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Spawn a Young Dryad on this row. Cooldown: 4 Devotion: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cooldown by the duration of Vitality on self.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: He was only meant to be a breeding stud to her. But in the end, they fell in love regardless.

name: Milaen
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4. Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The old baron treated poachers mercilessly. Luckily for Milaen, the old baron was dead and his men, desperate outlaws.

name: Sheldon Skaggs
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

name: Pavko Gale
ability:
Harmony.
Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. If you control only non-Neutral units, damage by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Harmony. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. If you control only non-Neutral units, damage by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: No one smuggled as much food to the elves of the Blue Mountains as Gale. He'd bring them sacks of turnips and, prized most of all, leeks.

name: Dunca
ability:
Veil.
Zeal. Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. 
At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, boost a random non-Neutral unit in your hand by 1.
ability_html: Veil. Zeal. Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, boost a random non-Neutral unit in your hand by 1.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: She does no warning shot, always aims to kill. No mercy, even for the little ones.

name: Sirssa
ability:
Harmony.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2 then boost a random unit in your hand by 2.
Deathblow: Boost a unit in your hand instead.
ability_html: Harmony. Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2 then boost a random unit in your hand by 2. Deathblow: Boost a unit in your hand instead.
keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
flavor: With silent grace, a dark-haired dryad nimbly descended a spiralling cascade of mushrooms along the tree's trunk, her lithe body camouflaged with fallen leaves.

name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (3).
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (3).
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Purify: Remove all statuses. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

name: Incinerating Trap
ability:
Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 5.
Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 5. Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.

name: Duén Canell Guardian
ability:
Veil.
Symbiosis.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Veil. Symbiosis. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: You have conquered the world, d'hoine, you are everywhere, everywhere you bring with you what you call progress. But we don't want you or your progress here.

name: Mahakam Marauder
ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to an allied unit's Armor.
Barricade: Boost self by that amount instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to an allied unit's Armor. Barricade: Boost self by that amount instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
flavor: Hunting on Mahakam's craggy cliffs is not particularly easy… but nor are dwarves particularly put off by danger.

name: Hamadryad
ability:
Symbiosis.
At the end of your turn, if this unit has Vitality, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Symbiosis. At the end of your turn, if this unit has Vitality, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: Hamadryads form a deep life-long bond with their tree – and its squirrels, of course.

name: Trained Hawk
ability:
Harmony.
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Move a unit to the other row.
ability_html: Harmony. Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Move a unit to the other row.
keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: I whistle once, it comes back. I whistle twice, it comes back with your eyes in its talons.

name: Dryad's Caress
ability: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3. If you control a Dryad, also give it Vitality (3).
ability_html: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3. If you control a Dryad, also give it Vitality (3).
keyword_html: Purify: Remove all statuses. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: Shh, shh... Evelienn va maeth, elaine blath...

name: Circle of Life
ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3, then boost a random non-Neutral unit in your hand by 2.
Deathblow: Boost a non-Neutral unit in your hand instead.
ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3, then boost a random non-Neutral unit in your hand by 2. Deathblow: Boost a non-Neutral unit in your hand instead.
keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
flavor: Those who want to destroy Brokilon, who try to burn its trees and kill all the living things in it, will soon enough become nourishment for its soil.

name: Dwarven Agitator
ability:
Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
ability_html: Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand. Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: Mark me words, if ye dinnae get up off yer arses, humans're gonnae come here an' steal our wenches!

name: Vrihedd Dragoon
ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1. If it's allied, boost it by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1. If it's allied, boost it by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.

name: Vrihedd Officer
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Bonded: Combine both abilities instead.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2. Bonded: Combine both abilities instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

name: Mahakam Defender
ability: Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!

name: Elven Wardancer
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage by 3 instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!

name: Mahakam Volunteers
ability: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Hoooahhh! Hoooaahhh! Hooo! Prepare yer hineys, clowns! Soon we'll be comin' 'round! Tae kick 'em till ye've feet for frowns!

name: Dryad Grovekeeper
ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality (2).
Bonded: Gain Vitality (4) instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality (2). Bonded: Gain Vitality (4) instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
flavor: Is it true? That flowers in Brokilon bloom seven times a year? But... How can that be?

name: Abandoned Girl
ability: Order: Transform into a Young Dryad without changing power, then gain Vitality equal to the number of Dryads on this row.
ability_html: Order: Transform into a Young Dryad without changing power, then gain Vitality equal to the number of Dryads on this row.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: People believe that sick girls will spread their illness among the dryads, but in reality, Brokilon protects its children. Abandoned ones, too.

name: Dryad Enchantress
ability:
Symbiosis.
Deploy (Melee): Give an allied unit 4 Armor.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
ability_html: Symbiosis. Deploy (Melee): Give an allied unit 4 Armor. Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: The dryads used to stay on the sidelines, avoiding the conflict between the races. But times change…

name: Dwarven Skirmisher
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If it survived, gain 1 Armor.
Order (Barricade): Damage an enemy unit by 3.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If it survived, gain 1 Armor. Order (Barricade): Damage an enemy unit by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
